title: Minutes of Tainan City Governmentâ€™s 418th Municipal Administrative Meeting 12/10/2019
content: Announcements1. The Bureau of Urban Development’s presentation on the 2019 Annual Report. (refer to written sources for details)Decision: Approved for reference filing2. The Land Office’s presentation on the 2019 Annual Report. (refer to written sources for details)Decision: Approved for reference filingMayor’s Remarks:(1) Land readjustment and development concerns a city’s prosperity and growth. It is also an issue that draws attention from people of all corners of the society. If we do well and deliver positive results, we will definitely gain more recognition from the public.(2) Regarding the transportation and delivery of agricultural products produced in the former Tainan County areas, the city government needs to put into more resources to improve the roads and canals. I appreciate the efforts from the Director-General Chen and all colleagues of the Land Office.
